word: H2000 - הָמַם - hâmam - haw-mam' - Break - உடை

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கலங்கடி கலங்கப் பண்ணு, அழி, ஒழி, நசுக்கு
to move noisily, to confuse, to make a noise, to discomfit, to break, to
consume, to crush, to destroy, to trouble, to vex
2) to confuse, to discomfit, to vex

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root (compare H1949, H1993); properly to put in commotion; by implication to disturb, drive, destroy: - break, consume, crush, destroy, discomfit, trouble, vex.
Cognate: H1950, H1967, H1995, H2000, H2001
